Title: Заглавие
Importing from iTunes will import your m: Importing from iTunes will import your music playlists. It will also import your ratings, the date you added the music, and play and skip counts for tracks in your library.
Please check that this file exists and t: Моля проверете, дали този файл съществува и дали съответното устройство е свързано.
This feature requires a Plex Pass subscr: This feature requires a Plex Pass subscription.
Everything you need to experience the be: Everything you need to experience the best of Plex. Your subscription gives you premium features and exclusive access to new ones.
{1}Sign in{2} to a Plex account with a P: {1}Sign in{2} to a Plex account with a Plex Pass subscription.
Some cloud storage providers limit file: Some cloud storage providers limit file size or upload time, If you have trouble, try reducing your quality setting. Cloud Sync content will not be available until all items are converted and uploaded.
A large number of sync items may be time: A large number of sync items may be time-consuming to convert, and the time to upload is dependent on your bandwidth. A large number of high quality items may take a very long time. If you have trouble, try reducing the number of items or your quality setting.
A large number of sync items may be time-consuming to convert and transfer to your device. If you have trouble, try reducing the number of items.
This media is being synced to your devic: This media is being synced to your device.
Watch the status of the sync {1}here{2}.
An invite will be sent to this user.
Restrict movies to any of the filters be: Restrict movies to any of the filters below.
Restrict TV shows to any of the filters: Restrict TV shows to any of the filters below.
We were unable to retrieve libraries for: We were unable to retrieve libraries for {1}. Please ensure the server is signed in to your Plex account.
Adding a Plex user to your home will all: Adding a Plex user to your home will allow you to quickly switch accounts. The invited user will be asked to confirm home membership.
Managed users are only available when si: Managed users are only available when signed in with an account in your home. You can choose any name you like and you'll be able to set restrictions on accessible media.
The invited user will be asked to confir: The invited user will be asked to confirm friendship. If libraries are shared with the user, you'll be able to set restrictions on accessible media.
{1}, so we've made a few changes to help: {1}, so we've made a few changes to help keep your media safe.
We've increased the security requirement: We've increased the security requirements on this server, so anything communicating with it will need to be signed in to a Plex account.
We've disabled DLNA to prevent any DLNA-: We've disabled DLNA to prevent any DLNA-enabled device from browsing and playing media without a password or PIN. You can change this preference in your {1}server settings{2}.
For more information on Plex Home securi: For more information on Plex Home security settings, please see the {1}Plex Home section{2} on our support site.
You do not currently have a PIN. This wi: You do not currently have a PIN. This will allow any users in this home to switch to your account.
Plex was unable to authenticate your ser: Plex was unable to authenticate your server. Please sign your server out and try again.
Your server was unable to reach Plex. Pl: Your server was unable to reach Plex. Please ensure that the computer or device running your server can access the internet.
You have successfully signed your server: You have successfully signed your server in to Plex, but we were unable to reach it from outside your network.
If you skip this step you will not be ab: If you skip this step you will not be able to share or stream media outside your home. If you change your mind later, you can adjust this in Settings.
If you would like to enable this now, yo: If you would like to enable this now, you will need to configure your router or firewall to allow Plex to contact your server. Please refer to our {1}Connecting a Server{2} article for more information.
Click {1}here{2} to add content to the l: Click {1}here{2} to add content to the library.
The library is still being refreshed. Ha: The library is still being refreshed. Hang on while we look for your content.
There is no content matching your active: Няма съдържание, което да съвпада с активния филтър.
Select which additional agents should co: Изберете кои допълнителни агенти следва да допринасят към метаданни от {1}, и ги плъзнете, за да промените реда на предпочитание.
Connecting your server to Plex allows yo: Connecting your server to Plex allows you to stream media outside your home network.
Enable this if automatic mapping fails. You will need to configure your router. Detailed instructions are available {1}here{2}.
Sets the allowed networks setting to 127: Sets the allowed networks setting to 127.0.0.1/255.255.255.255. This requires other computers on a local network to authenticate before accessing the server.
Settings are restricted from shared user: Settings are restricted from shared users.
Help us translate Plex/Web into your lan: Help us translate Plex/Web into your language {1}here{2}.
Do not prompt to select a user or enter: Do not prompt to select a user or enter a PIN during startup on this device.
Automatically play theme music in the ba: Автоматично изпълнява музикалната тема във фонов режим ако е налична.
Show unwatched icons in list items.
Press ? to view the list of {1}available: Натисни ? да прегледаш листа  на {1}възможните преки пътища{2}.
You can view the debug logs {1}here{2}.
Drag the items below to reorder your das: Drag the items below to reorder your dashboard content.
Allow searching libraries that have been: Allow searching libraries that have been shared with you.
Allow searching channels that have enabl: Позволи търсене на канали, които имат включено търсене.
Use the experimental video player, which: Use the experimental video player, which supports streaming to the HTML5 video element instead of the Flash player. Requires Plex Media Server 0.9.8.6 or later.
Allows the player to play compatible med: Позволява на плейъра да възпроизвежда съвместима медия без приспособяване. В повечето браузъри, Direct Play поддържа MP4 видео с h264 видео и AAC аудио. Видеоклипове със субтитри не могат да бъдат възпроизвеждани директно.
Allows the server to copy compatible aud: Позволява на сървъра да копира съвместими аудио и видео потоци без конвертиране.
When multiple resolutions are available: When multiple resolutions are available for a video, automatically use the best resolution below the maximum quality.
Allow Direct Play of AC3 Audio: Разреши Direct Play на AC3 аудио
Allow MP4 videos with AC3 audio to be pl: Позволи на MP4 видеоклипове с AC3 аудио да бъдат възпроизвеждани директно. Браузърите имат ограничена поддръжка за AC3 аудио.
Prefer AAC over MP3 when transcoding aud: Предпочитай AAC пред MP3, когато се транскодира аудио. Някой устройства, като Wii U, поддържат само HLS с AAC аудио.
Cinema Trailers to Play Before Movies: Cinema Trailers to Play Before Movies
Let's start by giving your Plex Media Se: Let's start by giving your Plex Media Server a friendly name so it can identify itself to other computers on the network. If you leave it blank, your computer name will be used.
Would you like to help us make Plex bett: Ще ни помогнете ли да направим Plex по-добър? Събираме данни анонимно, които използваме за подобряване на нашите услугите.
Plex channels give you access to online: Plex каналите ви дават достъп до онлайн медия от различни сайтове. Можете да търсите и инсталирате тези канали от Директорията с канали, започнете, като инсталирате някои от препоръчаните канали.
See, that wasn't too bad, right? At this: See, that wasn't too bad, right? At this very moment, Plex is working tirelessly to build your library, and make it look beautiful.
Feel free to watch Plex work, or take th: Feel free to watch Plex work, or take this opportunity to {1}download{2} some Plex apps!
We really appreciate it. See what {1}ben: We really appreciate it. See what {1}benefits{2} come with your subscription.
Преминете към Premium. Вземете Plex Pass.
Настройката не е разрешена за споделени сървари.
A problem has been detected with a core: A problem has been detected with a core component of Plex Media Server.
Please visit the {1}forums{2} and provid: Please visit the {1}forums{2} and provide your logs, as described {3}here{4}.
Sign in with a Plex account to help your: Sign in with a Plex account to help your devices find each other, access your media from anywhere, and queue up videos from your browser to watch later in Plex.
Plex organizes your media into libraries: Plex organizes your media into libraries. You can add as many libraries as you want, and you can have multiple libraries with the same type.
Upgrade to a Plex Pass and get exclusive: Upgrade to a Plex Pass and get exclusive access to the complete Plex experience! Awesomeness includes:
Parental controls and fast switching to: Parental controls and fast switching to users in your Plex Home
Sync your media and enjoy it anywhere: Sync your media and enjoy it anywhere
Free Apps for Android, Roku, and new pla: Free Apps for Android, Roku, and new platforms like Xbox, PlayStation, and VIZIO smart TVs
Enhance your movie experience with integ: Enhance your movie experience with integrated trailers and extras
To save a video to Watch Later, click \": To save a video to Watch Later, click "❯ Plex It!" in your Bookmarks Bar.
A panel will appear on the left side of: От лявата страна на екрана ще се появи панел, за да ви уведоми, че видеото е запазено.
You can also recommend the video to frie: You can also recommend the video to friends or "fling" it to a Plex player and watch it there.
Send an email to the address above with: Send an email to the address above with any link(s) you want added to Watch Later.
Add this to your address book so you can: Add this to your address book so you can easily email links from your iPhone, iPad, Android, or any other device.
Close Modal or Close Player or Navigate: Close Modal or Close Player or Navigate Back
This name will be used to identify this: С това име медия сървърът ще се идентифицира на останалите компютри в мрежата. В случай, че оставиш празно, ще се използва името на компютъра.
Send anonymous usage data to Plex: Изпращай анонимни данни за ползването към Plex
This helps us improve your experience (f: Това ни помага да подобрим вашето преживяване с Plex (например да намираме съответствия за филми и сериали)
Enable Plex Media Server verbose logging: Пусни подробен журнал на Plex Media Server
Ask to add a login item for externally m: Ask to add a login item for externally mounted drives
Enable Plex Media Server debug logging: Пусни дебъг журнал на Plex Media Server
Enable Plex Media Server token logging: Enable Plex Media Server token logging
Your library will be updated automatical: Библиотеката ще бъде обновявана автоматично, когато бъдат засечени промени по папките
Weeks to look at for On Deck: Weeks to look at for On Deck
The number of recent weeks used as the w: The number of recent weeks used as the window for On Deck
Allow clients to delete media: Разрешаване на клиентите да изтриват съдържание
Clients will be able to delete media: Клиентите ще могат да изтриват съдържание
Empty trash automatically after every sc: Автоматично изпразвай кошчето след всяко сканиране
Include music sections in automatic upda: Включи музикалните раздели при автоматичното обновяване
Large music sections may take a long tim: Големи музикални раздели могат да отнемат дълго време при сканиране
Number of seconds to wait before a plugi: Number of seconds to wait before a plugin times out
Capability checking ensures that plug-in: Проверката на възможностите гарантира, че добавки, които не са съвместими с версията на сървъра или клиента са скрити. Спирането на тази проверка е полезна при разработка, но ще разреши достъпа на добавки, които работят ненадеждно с някой клиенти или сървъри.
List of networks that are allowed withou: Списък с мрежи, които са разрешени без удостоверяване
Comma separated list of ip/netmask for n: Списък на ip/маска за мрежи, които са разрешени в PMS без удостоверяване, разделени със запетая
Enable Dolby Digital on Apple TV: Enable Dolby Digital on Apple TV
When playing video on an Apple TV, allow: When playing video on an Apple TV, allow Dolby Digital audio to play. You must go to Settings on the Apple TV and set Dolby Digital Out to "On" in the Audio & Video menu.
Quality profile used by the transcoder: Quality profile used by the transcoder
Timeout in seconds segmented transcodes: Timeout in seconds segmented transcodes wait for the transcoder to begin writing data
Duration in minutes to use when transcod: Duration in minutes to use when transcoding something with an unknown duration
Directory to use when transcoding for te: Directory to use when transcoding for temporary files
Amount in seconds to buffer before throt: Amount in seconds to buffer before throttling the transcoder
Show the WebKit window used by plugins i: Show the WebKit window used by plugins instead of placing it off screen
Enable Media Link down-mixing of DTS aud: Enable Media Link down-mixing of DTS audio.
Media Link does not support DTS audio in: Media Link не поддържа DTS аудио в някой региони. Plex Media Server може автоматично да преобразува DTS в Stereo.
